Upon appointment by the Tribal Council, the Commission member shall be swor
Appointment Process
Be a member of the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe;
Possess a minimum of a high school diploma or GED, with a preference for a
Pass a drug test and criminal background check;
Possess supervisory capability, with experience preferred;
Possess relevant and significant qualifications and experience. Areas of Hu
Submit proof of supervisory training or willingness to take training within
Be willing to maintain communication through technology and be accessible.
All Commission members and candidates shall:
Have a felony conviction.
Have been convicted of any misdemeanor offense within one (1) year of appli
Have been convicted of any drug or alcohol misdemeanor offense within the l
Have been convicted of any misdemeanor domestic violence or sexual assault
Be currently employed by the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribal Police Department.
Have been terminated for cause by any police department.
Have resigned within the past year from a police department.
Be an immediate relative, as defined by the SRMT Employee Handbook, to the
All Commission members and candidates shall not:
